game.name: Bazooka and Monster 2 Halloween
game.description:
It is time to kill some new kind of monsters with your bazooka and prove yourself as the best shooter in this awesome Halloween adventure! Your beautiful world is invaded by some cruel and heartless monsters and you are the only one who can save the people of your country. Grab your bazooka and be prepared to shoot down these deadly souls and take them out in Bazooka and Monster 2 Halloween! Your skill can help you to neutralize all of the beasts roaming around. 
You have to use your logical mind and shooting skills to clear the area from these monsters in this brand new action game. Try to be as precise as you can to secure the sufficient number of stars and stay in the game! Do not hesitate in bouncing your bullets with other objects and evade others. In several levels, you have to find out the better ways to shoot and clear the area from these bastards on the Halloween day. 
There are 18 unique and addictive levels to play through. You would get some points when you clear each level. Multiple objects and moving obstacles are awaiting you on your path so you need to be careful when you enter this HTML5 shooting game. You will achieve your objective only if all of your enemies will be finished. Choose your angel carefully to hit your target successfully! Killing each monster in one shot will help you earn three stars on each level. Good luck to complete all of the levels and use your Bazooka like a pro!
